hero.subtitle: From the Heart of Europe to Global Reach
hero.title: Connecting Continents Through Quality Trade
hero.description: Bizayla is a global trading company based in Germany, specializing in the import and export of natural and high-quality goods — with a strong focus on food products, minerals, and sustainable resources. From Europe to Asia, Africa, and the Americas, we build trusted bridges between producers and international markets

about.description: Since its establishment, Bizayla has built a strong foundation in international trade by connecting high-quality natural products and food goods with markets across Europe, Asia, and beyond. Our mission goes beyond transactions—we create long-term value through ethical sourcing, efficient logistics, and reliable partnerships.

section.desc1: Bizayla is an international trading company established in Bavaria, Germany, with the mission of bridging the gap between the rich natural resources of Central Asia and global markets. The brand was founded in 2025 by Dr.Abdulkarim Sadeqi (resident of Germany) and Ilkhomjon Ismoilovich (resident of Uzbekistan).
section.desc2: With a dynamic and globally-oriented approach, Bizayla has rapidly expanded its presence in the field of strategic import and export, securing a strong position in international markets.

salt.title: Natural Salt from Uzbekistan
salt.desc: One of Bizayla's core specialties is the export of high-purity natural salt from Uzbekistan to global markets. This salt is sourced from the Khodjaikansky mine, located in the Surkhandarya region, and is distinguished by the following features:
features: Suitable for food, industrial, pharmaceutical, and decorative uses
Customizable, high-quality packaging tailored to various markets
salt.desc2: Bizayla holds official export licenses for this product across multiple continents and is proud to be among the first companies to introduce Uzbek natural salt to European and global markets with professional branding and packaging.

team.title: MEET OUR TEAM
team.subtitle: We've 36+ Active & Dedicated Members for Helping the Customers
team.desc: At Bizayla, we are proud of our multinational and experienced team, consisting of international trade experts, natural resource engineers, and business consultants. With deep knowledge of global markets, our team is committed to building sustainable and trustworthy partnerships worldwide.

members.name: Zeinab Ghiyasi noei
members.role: business manager In Central Asia country

missionVision.title: Our Mission & Vision
missionVision.desc: We believe that transparent, responsible, and sustainable trade plays a vital role in global progress. Our mission includes:
points: Introducing the hidden natural treasures of Central Asia to the world
Supporting local producers and responsible mining practices
Providing fast, accurate, and reliable services to international clients
missionVision.vision: Our vision is to become, by 2028, one of the leading global brands in the export of salt and natural materials — a trusted reference for major companies and industries worldwide.

serviceCards.title: Empowering Your Growth
serviceCards.description: At Bizayla, we design and develop strategic, multilingual websites tailored to global trade and natural product branding.

info.mainTitle: Empowering Your Growth Through Smart Trade & Tailored Solutions
info.subTitle: At Bizayla, we combine deep market insights, personalized consulting, and cutting-edge packaging strategies to help businesses unlock their full potential. Whether you're a producer, exporter, or brand owner, we're here to guide your journey toward sustainable and global success.

cardsInfos.title: Business Planning and Technologist
cardsInfos.info: At Bizayla, we design growth strategies powered by modern technology and market insight. Our planning services help food and natural product companies navigate global trade, optimize resources, and scale with purpose.

cardsInfos.title: Human Resources and Consulting
cardsInfos.info: Bizayla supports businesses in building culturally competent, trade-savvy teams. Our HR consulting emphasizes international business ethics, multilingual collaboration, and specialized recruitment for food, minerals, and export sectors.

cardsInfos.title: Opportunities Global Business Service
cardsInfos.info: From Central Asia to Europe, Bizayla opens doors for local producers. Through branding, smart packaging, and logistics, we turn natural goods into globally trusted products—ready for Berlin, Dubai, and beyond.

cardsInfos.title: Insurance for Family Consulting
cardsInfos.info: Bizayla provides advisory services to exporters and business families, helping them manage risks, compliance, and strategic planning when entering new markets. Stability meets opportunity with our cross-cultural approach.

info.middleInfo: At Bizayla, we design and develop strategic, multilingual websites tailored to global trade and natural product branding. Our digital platforms are crafted to connect producers from Central Asia with buyers worldwide, using modern UI/UX standards, responsive design, and integrated e-commerce features. Whether showcasing premium salt, organic food, or health-based exports, our websites ensure seamless customer experiences, intelligent product presentation, and alignment with international market expectations.

middleCardItems.title: Why Choose Bizayla Services?
middleCardItems.info: At Bizayla, we believe in smart, sustainable, and globally-minded trade solutions. Our team of experienced professionals supports clients from strategy to execution, delivering high-quality services across food and mineral product sectors.
list: Tailored Solutions for Global Trade Challenges

iconItem1.title: Strategic Work Planning
iconItem1.info: At Bizayla, we develop customized work strategies to align with international trade standards. Our strategic planning ensures smooth export-import operations, optimized supply chains, and scalable growth paths for food and mineral product distribution.

iconItem2.title: Business Solutions
iconItem2.info: We offer practical and sustainable business solutions tailored to your market needs. From packaging innovation to branding consultancy and logistics support, Bizayla delivers complete trade solutions that empower local producers to thrive globally.

marketing.title: INTERNATIONAL TRADE CONSULTING
marketing.features: At Bizayla, we specialize in international trade consulting, export-import strategies, and smart branding for food, salt, and organic product industries. We've helped countless producers and trading companies expand into European markets, especially Germany.

section.description: At Bizayla, clear and effective communication with our customers, partners, and business associates is one of our core values. We are always ready to respond to your inquiries, suggestions, and requests with attention and respect. Whether you're interested in business collaboration, product purchases, export opportunities, representation, or any other matter — the Bizayla support and management team is here to assist you.

about.title: About Us
about.desc: Bizayla is a global trading and branding company connecting high-quality natural products from Central Asia to international markets through smart packaging, reliable logistics, and strong partnerships.

faqData.question: What services do you provide?
faqData.answer: Bizayla provides international trade and export solutions, specializing in food and natural product packaging, global branding, and smart logistics. We help businesses expand their reach through tailored consulting, product sourcing, and cross-border supply chain management—ensuring every product is ready for international markets.

faqData.question: How long does a typical project take?
faqData.answer: The duration of a Bizayla project depends on the type of product, target market, and logistics requirements. For example, preparing export-ready packaging and documentation can take 1–3 weeks, while large-scale sourcing and supply chain operations may require 1–3 months. We define precise timelines in coordination with each client based on their needs and destination country regulations.

faqData.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
faqData.answer: Yes, Bizayla offers continuous support throughout every stage of the export and trade process. From sourcing and packaging to documentation, logistics coordination, and after-shipment follow-up, we remain in close contact with our clients. Our team ensures smooth customs clearance, regulatory compliance, and reliable delivery, providing dedicated assistance for each shipment and long-term trade partnership.

faqData.question: What technologies do you use?
faqData.answer: At Bizayla, we utilize a combination of advanced supply chain tools, digital trade management systems, and smart packaging technologies to support our global food and mineral export operations. Our solutions include automated order tracking, multilingual B2B platforms, real-time inventory monitoring, and logistics optimization software. These technologies help us ensure timely delivery, product traceability, and seamless communication with our international partners.

faqData.question: Do you offer international marketing hosting and sales services for producers, companies, and food products?
faqData.answer: Yes, Bizayla provides comprehensive services for hosting international marketing and selling food and natural products for producers and companies. We create multilingual digital platforms, product showcase pages, brand presentations, and content management systems to help businesses introduce and export their goods to target markets across Europe, the Middle East, and Asia. Our services include: Hosting and designing dedicated product sales pages Digital marketing Export optimization (packaging, documentation, multilingual presentation) Direct connection between producers and global buyers/distributors Bizayla is the bridge between local production and global demand — with us, your products are ready for international success.
